ComicInfo.Summary:
A dark force has set its sights on the art world of San Francisco and the only ones who can stop it are Phoebe, Paige, and Piper! Dynamite is proud to present a brand-new Charmed story by writer Erica Schultz (Swords of Sorrow: Black Sparrow & Lady Zorro, Revenge) and artist Maria Sanapo (Grimm, DC Comics Bombshells) that will CHARM returning fans and new alike!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Joe Corroney | 1 | B | Cover B | Mary Sanapo | 2 | C | Group Photo Cover C | Photo | 3 | D | Paige Photo Cover D | Photo | 4 | E | Phoebe Photo Cover E | Photo | 5 | F | Piper Photo Cover F | Photo | 6 | G/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Joe Corroney | 7 | H/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Mary Sanapo | 8 | I/LE | Limited Edition "Black & White" Edition Cover | Mary Sanapo | 9 | Note: The digital edition (3/1/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
